abstract: All varieties of apples from United States will go on sale in China for first time.
lead_paragraph: China, which stopped buying American apples in 2012 because of concerns over a fungus, has now agreed to grant access to all American apple varieties.
snippet: China, which stopped buying American apples in 2012 because of concerns over a fungus, has now agreed to grant access to all American apple varieties.

headline.main: All Varieties of U.S. Apples to Sell in China for First Time
headline.print_headline: All Varieties of U.S. Apples to Sell in China for First Time
